fields.description:
Description:
While testing Email Dialog, I noticed that after picking an image email view does not appear. 
Does not occur on 1.8.2.

Spets:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI-Views-Email Dialog
3. Pick an image

Expected result:
Email view should appear

Actual result:
Email view is not shown
fields.summary: Android: Email Dialog - Email View does not appear on Kindle Fire
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.0.201203291340
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120329191102
Devices: Kindle Fire 6.3

comments.body:
Removing regression label and pulling from Release 2.0.1

@Ping have you already verified with Allen this is a duplicate of TIMOB-8459?
